title.rendered: Twitter Flooded with Congratulations tweets for ‘Team India’ latter few moments of the Great winning over England.

content.rendered:
BCCI, former cricketers and Indian cricket fans Congratulated Team India

India threw England from their own land and wins ODI series by 2-1. Earlier, Team India also trounced England in the three T20Is series with 2-1. The four test matches series went to tie end with 2-2 lead. As team India bounced back beautifully in the final of ODI match by brilliant performance of Hardik Pandya (4/24 of 7 overs, 3 maiden) and 71 runs off 55 and Rishabh Pant (125 off 113 balls; 16 fours, 2 sixes). Team India received congratulations tweets just after ending the match. In this order, It was very auspicious to see that Twitter was flooded with congratulations tweets for Team India just few moments of the great winning.

The Board of Control for Cricket in India(BCCI) shared a tweet with trophy emoji on its official twitter handle,

That Winning Feeling, Congratulations to Team India on winning the three matches ODI series as 2-1.

In another tweet BCCI,

       A memorable IND vs ENG tour for Team India as we finish it on a winning note. As India tours of England 2021-22  test series (2-2), T20Is (2-1), ODIs (2-1).

        The BCCI also congratulated Rishabh Pant and Star all-rounder Hardik Pandya for their brilliant performance in ODI. “A well-deserved century from Pant to take Team India over the line as he bags the Player of the Match award in the series decider. Pandya bags the Player of the Series award For his solid all-round performance as 6 Wickets and 100 Runs in ODI.” Added BCCI in the tweet.

Former cricketer Sachin Tendulkar in a tweet,

Congratulations to Team India on winning the ODI series. Keep up the good work and continue this form. Special mention to Rishabh Pant and Hardik Pandya.

Said The BCCI secretary Jay Shah in a tweet,

Congratulations Team India on winning both the ODI and T20I series in England. Rishabh Pant coming of age, Jasprit Bumrah’s consistency, Hardik Pandya in his elements and R Sharma’s leadership have been outstanding throughout the white ball matches ENG vs IND.

Many Twitter users congratulated team India as well star performer of the team in their own way. It was amazing to see the congratulations tweet for Team India which shared from across the world. It seems to like there were a congratulations flood on Twitter.

An overview on India tours of England 2021-22 

  • Test  Series    2-2
  • 3 T20 Series  2-1(Ind won)
  • ODI Series     2-1 (Ind won)

Read more: IPL franchise owners rule the roost, buy all 6 teams at CSA T20 League auction: Report
